note:
Seeker of an ethical world where we can live freely together within clean air, liberated from the tyrannies of the on-going infectious disease bio-terrors (including COVID-19) and from those who would ensure the victory of these pathogens as they prioritize profits over people.

Avatar is a circle having a red to yellow gradient with a stylized blue and grey number 0 in the center.
Banner is a spiral yellow to red gradient which suddenly changes to white, giving the appearance of a fiery eye.
